other_title: Edgar de la Cambriole : Le Dictionnaire de Napoléon (French)
Lupin III: Il tesoro degli avi (Italian)
Lupin III: Ruba il dizionario di Napoleone! (Italian)
Lupin Sansei: Napoleon no Jisho o Ubae (Japanese)
ルパン三世『ナポレオンの辞書を奪え』
plot: Lupin enters a French classic car race in order to win the prize of Napoleon's Dictionary, which supposedly doesn't contain the word "impossible"... and also happens to have directions to his grandfather's treasure.
ending_theme: "mihateme yume wo oikakete (見果てめ夢を追いかけて)" by Ruiko Kurahashi
